attributes.action: Stop the proposed HS2 route around Culcheth
attributes.additional_details:
The preferred route of the HS2 phase two passes extremely close to the village of Culcheth, Cheshire.

It will have a massive impact on the village due to it's close proximity.

Although I can understand the route taken, I believe that there is a possibility the route could pass further to the south of the village, closer to the M62, before continuing along it's proposed route.

I would like the government to review the route taken around the village of Culcheth.
